issue.title: [GLib] garrow_seekable_input_stream_peek() misses "error" parameter document
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5481](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5481). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/c_glib/arrow-glib/input-stream.cpp#L402

This is follow-up work of https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/ff2ee42092c09d13e38205fedd3acbdf375199f0
